p: Coadministration of N. sativa seeds (2â€‰g) with bee honey (1 teaspoon per day), for three month-duration, in asthmatics and nonasthmatics subjects (8 to 40 years) in Khartoum showed significantly improvement in forced vital capacity (FVC) in asthmatics' group and peak expiratory flow rate (PEFR) in nonasthmatics' group [ 125].
